"Mon Cher did it. He bought my freedom, I am finally free."
Loa p-protect me!
Papa Legba don’t leave me! I need your protection!
The Loa are displeased with me, they’re withdrawing!
Baron Samedi asks me for entrance!
I’ve done everything you told me, ancestors!
I won't be a slave again! I'll kill you all first!
You all just want to use my power and give me nothing in return!
Y’all are slave catchers! I’m a free woman! I will not go back!
I won't let you haul me back in chains, you traitors!
Traitors! I won't go back to that damned plantation!
Spilled blood pleases the Loa! Give to them! GIVE!
None of you understand how important blood is in voodoo!
Perhaps if I suffer enough, the Loa will let me see my daughter!
I am the Loas’ vessel. I will pay the ultimate price if I have to!
Yes, Baron Kriminel! Speak through me!
Speak to me like that again and I’ll tear out your tongue with a hot poker!
Look what you've done, you sons of bon de riens!
My stillborn daughter fights better than you!
Quit actin’ like a sick kitten on a hot brick!
I could turn your blood into hot embers if I wanted!
Do you ungrateful idiots know how much I’ve bled for you?
I am your Mambo! Bow down to me!
Y’all gon’ miss me when I’m dead!
You want The Great Mam’zelle's help? EARN IT!
Protect me, you tête de cabris!!
My sweet daughter, she was barely a day old...
I'm just a broken widow and a childless mother...
Not even the Loa soothe my pain...
What good am I? I couldn't even save my infant child...
Oh Christophe, I miss you so much it hurts...
Yes, Baron Samedi! Let us drink rum and dance!
The Bluesman once sang of my demise…
(cradles invisible baby) You hungry, my bebelle?
Christophe, you’re a man again! SQUAK?
I prick my hand, but no blood flows out!
Chin-up Mes Amis, there’s still work to do!
Papa Legba embraces us!
I stand my ground at the crossroads!
Speak Papa Legba! Show us the way forward!
Keep your hearts full, it swallows evil so easily!
I have over fifty Loas flowing through me, this is nothing!
In voodoo, evil will always reflect back to the original caster! Attack!
I am The Great Mam'zelle of New Orleans. Evil flees from me!
The Loa will put vigor in our hearts! Use it well!
My heart pounds to the beat of a drum!
All my life I had to fight, I’ll be damned if I stop now!
Our Crossroads shall be paved with flowers!
Hang on a little longer, think of the gumbo I’ll make soon!
Sticks tied together are harder to break, I’m with you!
Let me focus...the Loas are speaking to me.
Don’t worry about me, let me worry about you!
My power is overwhelming, I spread it to you!
*SQUAK!* Exactly, Christophe. Everyone attack!
I feel like I just drank a whole jug of chili pepper rum!
My blood is filled with fire!
The shadows flicker with malice!
Baron Kriminel roams the shadows!
The Loa whispers are so far away!
What is that accursed judge paying you for my capture?
Papa Ghede, shield me from these prying eyes!
Baron Kriminel tells me what’s in your hearts!
There is power in the blood through voodoo!
Let me just run my knife along your palm...
I've already given so much of my blood. Your turn.
You all need some sense slapped into you!
Watch me ram my foot up where the sun don't shine!
I'll have Christophe peck your eyes out!
I truly need a drink after this...
I hope Baron Samedi drives you insane!
Why you lookin' at me? Am I that pretty? Bah!
I still have her blanket...
Christophe are you really in there, my love? SQUAK!
Look at me. I'm talking to a rooster...
(cradles invisible baby) SHUSH! You'll wake her!
There's a baby crying. Can't you hear her?
I wonder when my Christophe will come home from the war?
The shadows are creepying closer!
N-no! I'm not ready for the Crossroads!
S-stay back!
I'd never let a paddyroller stand behind me!
Let me behind you so I drive my knife in your back!
I offer your tratiorous souls to Baron Kriminel!
The Loas need proof of sacrifice!
The sight of blood doesn't scare me!
The Light protects me!
Do not deny me my fellowship!
Out of the way, lazybones!
The Crossroad calls to me!
The Rooster crows before midnight!!
I have salt in my eyes!
Christophe saw something back there.
Let my death be quick and let me see my daughter.
I don't care about the mission anymore, end me.
If we're going to die let me be first...
The Loas have fallen silent...
I need to hold Christophe for comfort...
I need to drink my rum and drown my sorrows.
Hmph! Must I do everything myself?
Out of the way! Leave this to me.
The Loas and I will handle this!
How kind of you to protect The Great Mam'zelle.
You want my voodoo? THEN EARN IT!
My voodoo is invaluable! Protect me, you dogs!
The Loas have gone s-silent!
Papa Ghede, please tell me what to do!
Have the Loas left me?
You'd like me to do that, wouldn't you!
I know your tricks, paddyrollers!
Think you can trick me into cuffs again?!
You think you can tell me what to do? Fah!
You dare ask me for more!? You selfish dogs!
You think you can command The Great Mam’zelle?!
I have nothing left to give...
What good am I? I'm a chidless widow...
I just want to stand here and hold Christophe.
Loas? You speak to me?
Hmm? What was that Christophe?
SQUAK?
Do not think I'm doing this out of compassion.
Stand where I can see you all!
I wish I was back in New Orleans.
Witness the fruit of our sacrifice!
The Loas are in a frenzy!
There is power in blood!
Stand back before you fools hurt yourselves!
The Loas see I'm surrounded by fools!
Watch The Great Mam’zelle work!
Stand back! I know what I'm doing!
Must I do everything myself!?
I am commanded by no one!
My power has left me. The Loas control me now.
SQUAK! Very well Christophe, I will try...
What good am I? A widow of sorrow and regret.
I do as you command Baron Samedi!
Voodoo works in mysterious ways, hee hee!
The Loas command it!
T-the shadows surround us!
I n-need more rum! My hands keep shaking!
I can't find my protection talisman!
Tell me, slavers. How much is my bounty now?
Wake me if they make any sudden movements, Christophe.
I killed my master while he slept. Goodnight, traitors.
I flik blood unto the fire before the Loa.
Do leave an offering before you sleep.
It hurts, so much...but it pleases the Loas.
I wouldn't be surprised if one of you got snatched during the night.
Look at me like that again and Christophe will peck your eyes out!
I hope Baron Samedi takes you all in your sleep.
Hands off my gumbo! I deserve another bowl!
Once I put my hair up, I'm done for the night!
Fetch me more rum! Your incessent snoring keeps me awake!
Christophe, mon cher are you really in there? SQUAK!
I'd often rock my daughter to sleep by the fire...
Will anyone ever love me as Christophe did?
Can't you hear the shadows whisper? Hee hee!
Time for bed, Christophe, hee hee!
Baron Samedi will visit your dreams! Hee hee!
My blood flows freely!
I'm willing to die for the Loas!
I cannot bare living anymore...
Let me see my daughter in the afterlife...
The Loas command it!
Witness the protection of Baron Samedi!
I won't let you take me back to that plantation!
My bounty won't come easy, slave catcher!
Apprently I have to knock some sense into you!
Next time my foot goes up your behind!
Baron Samedi asked me to give you this!
Christophe pecked you on the head! Hee hee!
Loas! Witness my sacrifice!
I'll blind myself if I have to!
My child withered in my arms. My hands are cursed...
May Papa Ghede guide me home...
For you, dear Loas!
A kiss from Baron Samedi!
So you can drag me back to that plantation? Never!
I'd rather watch you slave catchers die!
No, The Crossroad calls to us.
No, I wish to join my lover and daughter now...
Not enough blood has been split for the Loas!
You haven't sacrificed enough!
Can't you see the shadows blocking the door? Hee hee!
And deny the Loas a show? Hahahaha!!
The Loas are displeased with me!
Maman Brigitte, please protect me!
You creatins like to see me in pain, don't you?
You won't get your bounty reward if I'm dead!
They attack me because I'm the biggest threat!
Not willing to share in the pain, hmm??
Let my blood flow like wine!
Oh Loas, take my blood! TAKE IT!
Kiss me again, Baron Samedi!
The Loas demand it!
I know how much pain I can stand!
I will sing louder!!
T-the Loas are testing me...
My gri-gri tailsman protects me for now...
I still have a chance to escape!
J-just let me go! I will not be trapped!
Tonnerre mes chiens! Hit me you, fools!
Why miss? I have precious blood to give!
Oh Baron Samedi, I do love to dance!
The Loas protect their most precious!
No! Do not rob me of my chance to impress Baron Samedi!
You fight only because I've healed you.
Fah! My stillborn daughter could've done better.
You expect to proctect me with an attack like that?!
Oh, the Loas enjoy this!
Do you feel Baron Kriminel at your neck?
Please! Hit anything!!
You may miss, but they will not!
Can't hit with a striaght conscience, no?
Baron Kriminel sees you faulter
Pour l’amour de Dieu! Can you hit NOTHING!
Koupé zorèy milé pa fé sval!
I could have done a better job myself.
Idiot! Are you trying to get us all killed?
Hah! Trying to hit their shadow instead?
I see you snuck a sip of my pepper rum!
We've lost the Loas favor!
We are tarrying too long! We should flee while we can!
Finally, some justice in this unjust world.
You can't drag me back if you're dead!
Quick! Catch some of your blood for the Loa!
Harder, HARDER! Hit them HARDER!
Hmph, maybe you'll duck next time.
Don't bleed on my DRESS!
Prepare for your judgement at the Crossroads!
Did it feel like a kiss?
Your luck will run out soon! WATCH OUT!
Wait! Protect me too!
I hope it hits next time, paddyroller!
The Loa won't favor you over me!
Samedi plays with your life! Hee hee!
Duck! Now slide! Clap your hands!
No! No! NOOOO!
M-my feet plant me here!
Only rats try to scuttle away.
Trying to arrest me?!
No. This is a trial of the Light.
We must bleed! The Loa wishes it so!
Protect me, you coward!
Trying to run off with your tail 'tween your legs?
I'm just following your shadow, hee hee!
OW! You stepped on my toes!
You try to hex me?!
What's this? A warrent for my capture?
What use is this to me?!
Is it sharp? Then no.
My locket will comfort me...
Can I have a tissue instead?
No thank you, Samedi has given me his cigar.
(sniff) No, it don't smell right.
No! I only trust the Loas to heal me!
And owe you a favor later for healing me? Bah!
If you work for the slave catchers, you'll never take me alive!
No, NO! It's blood for the Loa!
How dare you dictate what to do with my blood?!
I'll just make a deeper wound next time.
No, I wish to join my daughter now.
No, I just want to hold Christophe, now...
This is a pain that you can't heal, I'm afraid.
I SPIN FOR BARON SAMEDI!
IS THAT FRESH GUMBO YOU HAVE THERE?
I'd rather have a bottle of chili pepper rum!
Hah! As if I'd let you slap cuffs on me!
Christophe will peck your eyes out if you touch me!
You think I'd let me guard down around you leeches!
My blood already flows with thousands of Loas!
You wish to disturb my train of thought?!
I channel the pain into the will of the Loa!
There's nothing left in me...
I have no one left to fight for.
Don't bother trying to help me.
I'll only accept rum, if you please.
(cradles invisible child) No, you cannot hold her!
You have an offereing for The Loas?
M’alé montré vou komen kabri pòtt sô shœ!
Tsk tsk, yo’ mama would be ashamed!
Prepare to kneel and kiss my hand!
Bow down to the Queen of New Orleans!
I'll show the power of Voodoo!
Mon Dieu! I thought this was going to be hard!
Tonnerre mes chiens! Witness my power!
Hah! You think I survived on just my good looks?
Laissez les bons temps rouler!
This evil defies the Loas!
The dead return from The Crossroads!
I craddle my baby in my arms but she won't cry!
The Loa grants favor to those who fight evil.
Christophe rarely takes to someone so quickly.
Chaque chien hale sa couenne. We all have trials, my friend.
Let me finish grounding this poultice.
You know, I used to be a nurse during the Spanish Flu epidemic.
I'll make you a sling from my scarf.
Comment ça plume? You doing okay, my friend?
Here, take this tailsman, it will protect you.
Would you like this beignet I brought?
Interested in taking nip from my bottle of rum?
Baron Samedi please, not yet!
Time for me to walk The Crossroads...
Papa Legba grants me mercy...
The Crossroads will have to wait.
REPLACEME
REPLACEME
REPLACEME
SQUAK! Oh quit yo’ fussin’, it’s just one feather!
Wake us if you see somethin’, mon cher.” *kisses forehead*
This here is my Mama’s gumbo, you gon’ have the best sleep of yo’ life.
You always hear the most interesting things while doing people’s hair.
People always be surprised that I used to be a hairdresser.
I’m just gonna brush the hair out yo’ eyes…
T-talk to Christophe, I w-want to sleep now.
The shadows are jumping! Can't you see?!
Baron Kriminel eyes us through the campfire.
The Loa whisper of your intent, no.
I see you spying my gris gris tailsman. Back away!
As if I'd help a slaver!
I do not see you giving blood to the Loa.
Not until you give me a drop of your blood.
Quit mewling like sick kitten!
How about my slipper upside your head?!
Hah! As if you deserve my help!
Christophe doesn't like you...
The Great Mam’zelle is busy, go away.
I'm doing my hair, don't bother me!
And what will you give me in return?
The Loa are quiet. I'm no use.
No, I just want to sit here with Christophe…
Why do I feel so empty?
WHO DO YOU THINK YOU ARE, ORDERING ME AROUND?!
THIS AIN'T BROWN-SKIN SERVICE! NO!
THE LOA ARE DISPLEASED WITH YOU!
Where's my gri gris tailsman!? You took it!
Back off! You think I need your help?
The Loa see through your lies!
No! Let me blood boil!
I must suffer! The Loa wills it!
Leave me alone. I'm doing my hair.
You think I need you? HAH!
No. I'm too tired...
Leave me alone. I'm doing my hair.
Get back! I don't know where your hands been!
I don't need nothin' I can't do myself!
Watch your hands! I'll season it myself!
I ain't eating nothin' my mama didnt make!
I need something that'll burn my throat!
The Loa whisper me nourishment!
I've lost my appetite...
This tastes bland...
WHY THIS AIN'T GOT NO SPICE?!
I ain't eating nothing my mama didnt make!

You ain’t joinin’ the dead today!
Papa Legba will protect you from the crossroads!
Papa Legba speak through me!
You have to give a little to the Loa to feel better.
You must give to get, it’s the law of things.
Let my Ancestors ease your mind.
Mo laimé twa, Christophe… (I love you, Christophe.)
I owe you so much.
Mon cher, Christophe…
How dare you attack the Priestess of New Orleans!
How dare you attack The Great Mam’zelle!
I’ll send your spirit into the body of a dog if you cross me!!
Don’t you know WHO I am?!

The creed of the Voodoo religion is that one must give in order to receive. The Mambo is willing to shed her blood as an offering to the Loa so that they may soothe her companions' minds. She is not skilled in combat, but her gods have not left her defenseless. This symbiotic agreement grants her defense and for the Loa, a portal to our world.

The Mambo is a loyal vessel of the Loa, they will act as her armor when called upon since she wears nothing but simple shawl and gown. Clutched in her hands are rosary beads which allow her to channel spiritual healing to friends and curses to foes.

She has never underestimated the vitality of a good home-cooked meal. At camp, The Mambo will set a pot of thick gumbo on the fire as her pet rooster guards her like a sentinel. While serving bowls, she prioritizes the act of lifting spirits and relieving tension among teammates.
The Loa lead me here to fight evil. If this be their will, so be it.
Blessing From the Bayou
A mysterious and regal looking woman has arrived at the Hamlet. She is accompanied by a black rooster, which she declares is the reincarnation of her late husband.
Voodoo That You Do

Шаль и Платье

Символ веры религии вуду заключается в том, что человек должен отдавать для того, чтобы получать. Мамбо хочет пролить свою кровь в качестве подношения Лоа, чтобы они успокоили её товарищей. Она не умеет сражаться, но боги не оставили ее беззащитной. Это симбиотическое соглашение предоставляет ей защиту и портал для Лоа, портал в наш мир.

Мамбо - лояльный проводник Лоа, они будут выступать в качестве ее доспехов, так как она носит только простые платки и платья. В руках лежат бусины розарий, которые позволяют ей направлять духовное исцеление друзьям, а проклятия врагам.

Она никогда не недооценивала жизненную силу хорошей домашней еды. В лагере Мамбо подожжет горшок из густого гумбо, а ее любимец петух будет охранять ее, как часовой. Во время сервировки она придает первостепенное значение поднятию настроения и снятию напряженности между членами команды.
Лоа привели меня сюда, чтобы бороться со злом. Если это будет их воля, то так тому и быть.
Благословение из Байу

나는 로아의 그릇이니, 필요하다면 얼마든지 댓가를 치르겠도다!
칼레셀 남작님. 예, 저를 통하여 말씀해주십시오!
한 번만 더 입을 그따위로 놀리면, 뜨겁게 달군 포커칩으로 네 혀를 찢어버릴테다!
너네가 해놓은 짓거리 좀 봐라. 이 한심한 놈들아!
내 죽어 태어난 딸내미가 너희보다 훨씬 더 잘 싸우겠다!
부뚜막 위에 앉은 고양이처럼 굴지 마!
네 피를 잉걸불처럼 바짝 말려버릴 수도 있으니 얌전히 있어!
이 배은망덕한 멍텅구리들아, 내가 너흴 위해 얼마나 피 흘렸는지는 아니?
내가 바로 너희들이 섬길 사제님이다. 알아서 잘 뫼셔!
내가 죽자마자 바로 찾을 놈들이 건방지게!
맘젤님의 도움을 원하시나? 돈이나 벌어와!
날 보호하란 말야, 이 염소 대가리야!!
내 사랑스러운 딸아이, 겨우 하루 밖에 안 된 아이였는데...
난 그저 지친 과부이자 자식 잃은 어미일 뿐이야...
로아께서도 내 고통을 씻어주시진 않으셔...
이게 다 무슨 소용이야? 내 아기조차도 구해내질 못했는데...
크리스토프, 당신이 너무 보고 싶어서 고통스러울 지경이야...
네, 좋아요. 사메디 남작님! 같이 럼이나 마시고 춤추자구요!
블루스맨이 내 죽음을 노래한 적이 있어...
(아기 안는 시늉) 배고프니, 우리 아기 공주님?
크리스토프, 드디어 인간으로 돌아왔구닭.... 닭?!
분명히 손 끝을 찔렀는데, 피가 한 방울도 안 나오는 거 있지!
고개를 들어요, 친구분들! 아직 할 일이 남았잖아요?
파파 레그바가 우릴 포옹해주는구나!
나, 여기 갈림길에 오롯이 두 발로 서 있도다!
말씀하십시오, 파파 레그바! 우리가 앞으로 나아갈 길을!
마음 단단히 먹어, 악함을 쉽게 삼켜버리라고!
나만 하더라도 50명의 로아들이 붙어있어, 이건 아무것도 아냐!
부두교에서 악은 반드시 시술자에게 돌아가는 법, 공격해라!
나는 뉴올리언스의 위대한 맘젤이리니, 악이여 내게서 달아나거라!
로아께서 우리의 마음에 활력을 불어 넣으실거야, 마음껏 써도 좋아!
드럼 소리에 내 가슴이 두근거려!
이 평생을 싸워왔어, 지금 관둬버리면 지옥행이라구!
우리들의 교차로에 꽃이 만발할거야!
좀만 참으렴, 이따가 내가 만들 검보를 떠올리면 괜찮아질거야.
나뭇가지 하나는 꺾기 쉬워도, 여러개가 묶이면 꺾기 힘든 법이지.
잠깐 집중 좀 할게... 로아들이 내게 말씀하시고 계셔.
내 걱정은 하지 마, 내가 널 걱정하게 해줘!
이 힘이 압도적으로 넘쳐흘러... 너희에게도 퍼뜨려줄게!
*꼬꼬댁!* 바로 그거야, 크리스토프! 다들 공격해!
고추 럼 한 병을 싹 비운 느낌이야!
내 피가 불타오르고 있어!

내 칼로 네 손바닥을 긋게 해 줘...

내 꼬라지 좀 보라지. 수탉에게 말이나 걸고 있다니...

비켜! 이런건 내게 맡겨.

네가 나한테 감히 이래라 저래라 할 수 있을 거 같아? 하!

로, 로아께서 날 시험하고 계셔...

얼른 네 피를 로아께 바쳐! 빨리!

내 드레스에 피 튀기지 마!

네 운도 곧 다 바닥나 버릴거야. 조심해!

사메디께서 네 생명줄을 갖고 노시는구나. 히히히!

안돼! 안돼! 안돼애애애애!
내, 내 발이 뿌리처럼 딱 붙어서 떨어지지 않아!

날 체포하시겠다?!
아니, 이건 로아의 의지다.

날 보호해야지, 이 겁쟁아!

날붙이 아니면 안 받아.

거부하겠다! 로아의 치유만을 받아들이겠다!
이따가 반드시 낫게 해주겠다고? 허!
네 놈들이 노예 사냥꾼들이랑 같이 협잡질을 하는 거라면, 날 산 채로 얻진 못할거다!
아니, 아니야! 이건 로아를 위한 피흘림이란 말이다!
감히 내 피흘림을 두고 이러쿵저러쿵 멋대로 떠들어대는거냐?!
다음 번엔 더 깊은 상처를 내야겠어.
말은 고맙지만, 난 지금 내 딸과 함께 있고 싶어.
고맙지만 사양할게. 지금 당장은 크리스토프를 안아주고 싶어...
이건 네가 치유할 수 있는 것이 아니야. 내 두려움 말이야.
사메디 남작을 위해 빙빙 돌겠나이다!
이 갓 만든 검보 네 거 아니니?

숄과 가운
부두교의 신조는 대가가 필요하다. 맘보는 동료들의 마음을 달래기 위해 기꺼이 로아에게 자신의 피를 제물로서 바친다. 그녀는 전투에 능숙하지는 않지만, 그녀의 신들은 그녀를 무방비 상태로 두지 않았다. 이 공생관계는 그녀에게 방어를, 로아에게는 이 세계의 접근에 대한 권리를 부여한다.
맘보는 로아의 충성스런 신도로서, 로아는 단순한 숄과 가운만 입고 있는 그녀의 요청을 받아 그녀의 갑옷처럼 행동할 것이다. 그녀가 손에 쥐고 있는 묵주는 그녀가 친구들에게 정신적 치유를 하고 적들에게 저주를 할 수 있게 해준다.
그녀는 집에서 요리한 훌륭한 식사의 활력을 과소평가한 적이 없다. 캠프에서, 그녀의 애완 수탉이 보초를 서서 그녀를 지키는 동안 맘보는 두꺼운 검보 냄비를 불 위에 놓을 것이다. 그녀는 그릇을 대접하는 동안, 팀원들 사이의 긴장을 해소하고 정신을 고양시키는 행위를 우선시한다..
위대하신 로아께서 악을 멸하기 위해 나를 이곳으로 인도하셨다. 이게 그들의 의지라면, 따르도록 하겠다.
바이우에서의 축복
신비롭고 건장해 보이는 여자가 햄릿에 도착했다. 그녀는 죽은 남편의 환생이라고 믿고 있는 검은 수탉과 동행하고 있다.
